title: aanestic
author: aanestic
content: Barely a month ago I sat down one evening in a cafe with my gym coach and we had a scholarly and political conversation as we munched down pastries and sipped on beverages in an attempt to regain some of the calories we had lost on that day's workout session. In the heat of the conversation, a door was unlocked in his mind as I watched him go down on his the Shawarmaarma roll---he suddenly had a what-if moment when he shared an absurd idea with me about having a product that could close down all the gym outlets(paraphrasing...).At first, I thought he was tired of his job and possibly depressed but after suppressing the titanic urge to interrupt him for a while, like every good idea, what started flat absurd began to sound fruitful. And by the time my bottle of water got 70% low on content, we had already gone through a whole business plan, asking and answering questions and complementing each other for being so smart.The evening did not end as another normal evening because I recorded it in my diary as a special day. As a matter of fact, after the meeting, I went straight to my team and shared the idea with them.Today I am happy to share the result of 3 rolls of shawarma and two educated minds. I worked with my gym coach and the relentless bright minds at Bromuno and we came up with Macoach. It is our very first product to reach the production stage.What do you think of it?

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: It is good you worked on the idea else it never would have come to life. Many people have good ideas, but they never record it, they never work to bring it to life, so the idea is wasted and waits to meet another person that will make it work. Many products and services that we enjoy today all started as ideas that the people who had them, worked on and we have them to thank. whenever we have god ideas, we should always ensure to try to make it work especially when it is an idea that betters life and improves standard of life. People who work on ideas are necessary for the progress of the society.

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: If you have all written down, a.) Business Plan, b.) Marketing Plan, c. ) Webpage to give a face value. Banks or Venturecapitals lined up?

comments.author: Alisha-k
comments.body: Quote from: aanestic on April 11, 2023, 09:32:22 PMBarely a month ago I sat down one evening in a cafe with my gym coach and we had a scholarly and political conversation as we munched down pastries and sipped on beverages in an attempt to regain some of the calories we had lost on that day's workout session. In the heat of the conversation, a door was unlocked in his mind as I watched him go down on his the Shawarmaarma roll---he suddenly had a what-if moment when he shared an absurd idea with me about having a product that could close down all the gym outlets(paraphrasing...).At first, I thought he was tired of his job and possibly depressed but after suppressing the titanic urge to interrupt him for a while, like every good idea, what started flat absurd began to sound fruitful. And by the time my bottle of water got 70% low on content, we had already gone through a whole business plan, asking and answering questions and complementing each other for being so smart.The evening did not end as another normal evening because I recorded it in my diary as a special day. As a matter of fact, after the meeting, I went straight to my team and shared the idea with them.Today I am happy to share the result of 3 rolls of shawarma and two educated minds. I worked with my gym coach and the relentless bright minds at Bromuno and we came up with Macoach. It is our very first product to reach the production stage.What do you think of it? dreams are meant to be realistic not buried, you've proven that quote and I am happy for you.It's one thing to have an idea of something and another thing to birth it and be proud of your creation, I hope your product beats the test of time, I'd like to know more about it though.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I don’t know what I think of it, seems you had a great day with your friend though.What I thought reading your post, probably wasn’t what you were looking for but you write/type superbly. You should think about writing children's books or something. You have a way with words.

comments.author: MIner1448
comments.body: Congratulations on the successful launch of your first product, Macoach! It's great that you were able to turn your idea into reality. This shows your enterprise and determination.Starting a new business or developing a new product is always an exciting and risky process. It is important to remember that success is not guaranteed, but it is such initiatives and innovative ideas that lead to progress and the achievement of new heights.If you and your team have carefully developed a business plan and see the potential in your product, then that's great. However, remember that successful product implementation requires not only an idea, but also effective marketing, promotion, and meeting the needs of the target audience. Be prepared for challenges and adapt as you develop your product.Good luck to you and your team with Macoach! I hope your product will be successful and benefit your customers.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: aanestic on April 11, 2023, 09:32:22 PMToday I am happy to share the result of 3 rolls of shawarma and two educated minds. I worked with my gym coach and the relentless bright minds at Bromuno and we came up with Macoach. It is our very first product to reach the production stage.What do you think of it?I don't understand what "Bromuno" or "Macoach" is, nor how you got to the stage of production, looks like you're still under the influence of the drink!!!

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Quote from: aanestic on April 11, 2023, 09:32:22 PMThe evening did not end as another normal evening because I recorded it in my diary as a special day. As a matter of fact, after the meeting, I went straight to my team and shared the idea with them.What has come of that project, you got tips but don't answer?

comments.author: Eh Moo Nah
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on May 14, 2023, 09:53:27 AMI don’t know what I think of it, seems you had a great day with your friend though.What I thought reading your post, probably wasn’t what you were looking for but you write/type superbly. You should think about writing children's books or something. You have a way with words.July 12,2023 1:37 am Eastern Standard Time as I am writing my comment and quoted this post wishing that the cold breeze from the aircoindition will stay the same up until sunrise......  anyways haha I think O.P's idea is to write - publish - book. Sometimes being in a virtual world is a challenge to be in someones imagination. lol.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Businesses are birthed through ideas but the brainstorming of businesses are only done by bright minds. Not everyone who has had an idea actually saw it to fruition but the few that did always gets happy it never died at ideation phase. I congratulate you on your idea become business but one thing is for sure, most things we consider as ideas and only for profit generation turns out to become the very reason why we actually came into earth. Just like having people stuck in a particular room with the door closed from outside, there is need for someone from outside to open it up to free the people locked from within and a person is sent specifically for that purpose, that's business for the person but more than business is the purpose.

comments.author: TakeItEasy
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on November 18, 2023, 07:59:02 PMBusinesses are birthed through ideas but the brainstorming of businesses are only done by bright minds. Not everyone who has had an idea actually saw it to fruition but the few that did always gets happy it never died at ideation phase. Sometimes we have to make ourselves like others as I'm not sure for that it would be done every time and every aspect of life but we have to do it a little. And also if we do something we have some idea for doing the thing as you gave an example of the person and the door that is all about the things and ideas we have.We don't take steps until  we have given somethings better to write and until we have given something better to speak through. But still we can trying our best for a good time and for the business of our will in which we feels so comfortable.

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.body: Most ideas are just that ideas. Hardly any idea makes it to become reality, due to a lot of factors. One is organisation, most people are highly non-organized or using a different word: chaotic.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on June 07, 2023, 10:34:12 AMQuote from: aanestic on April 11, 2023, 09:32:22 PMToday I am happy to share the result of 3 rolls of shawarma and two educated minds. I worked with my gym coach and the relentless bright minds at Bromuno and we came up with Macoach. It is our very first product to reach the production stage.What do you think of it?I don't understand what "Bromuno" or "Macoach" is, nor how you got to the stage of production, looks like you're still under the influence of the drink!!!I neither understand what either of them means but the point of the thread is that great things starts from small beginnings which means that sometimes thoughts that seems insignificant can end up being solution to a problem and we shouldn't just discard any innovative ideas that crosses our minds. Before Satoshi Nakamoto, created Bitcoin, I'm sure that the concept was just a thought until he began to see the potentials of it and how to invent it to become a reality, also the geniuses that thought about the possibilities of creating electric bulbs, aeroplanes and computer, it was all thoughts until they eventually made them to become realities. The human mind have so much capacity to make almost everything to happen, but most of us are too lazy to put in the brain work.
